source.0b9bf799:
## 'outc_cod'
##### CODE MEANING_TEXT
* DE Death
* LT Life-Threatening
* HO Hospitalization - Initial or Prolonged
* DS Disability
* CA Congenital Anomaly
* RI Required Intervention to Prevent Permanent Impairment/Damage
* OT Other Serious (Important Medical Event)
